required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study of Pembrolizumab in the First Line Therapy for R/M HNSCC in China
clinical_study.official_title: A Prospective Registration Study of Pembrolizumab in the First Line Therapy for PD-L1 CPS≥20 Recurrent or Metastatic Head and Neck Squamous Cell Carcinoma in China

brief_summary.textblock: This trial is main evaluate the efficacy and safety of pembrolizumab in the first-line treatment of Chinese patients with recurrent or metastatic head and neck squamous cell carcinoma with PD-L1 CPS≥20.

detailed_description.textblock: This trial is a single-center, prospective phase II clinical study, which mainly evaluates the efficacy and safety of first-line treatment with pembrolizumab in patients with recurrent and/or metastatic head and neck squamous cell carcinoma with PDL1 CPS≥20 in China.

primary_outcome.description: To evaluate the objective response rate (ORR, RECIST standard 1.1 evaluation) of pembrolizumab in the first-line treatment of Chinese patients with recurrent and or metastatic head and neck squamous cell carcinoma with PDL1 CPS≥20
To evaluate the survival time (OS) of pembrolizumab in the first-line treatment of Chinese patients with recurrent and or metastatic head and neck squamous cell carcinoma with PDL1 CPS≥20

secondary_outcome.description: To evaluate the objective response rate of pembrolizumab in the first-line treatment of Chinese patients with recurrent and or metastatic head and neck squamous cell carcinoma with PDL1 CPS≥20 (ORR, iRECIST standard evaluation)
To evaluate the disease control rate (DCR) of pembrolizumab in the first-line treatment of Chinese patients with recurrent and or metastatic head and neck squamous cell carcinoma with PDL1 CPS≥20
To evaluate the duration of response (DOR) of pembrolizumab in the first-line treatment of Chinese patients with recurrent and or metastatic head and neck squamous cell carcinoma with PDL1 CPS ≥ 20

To evaluate the progression-free survival (PFS, PFS2) of patients with recurrent and or metastatic head and neck squamous cell carcinoma with PDL1 CPS ≥ 20 in the first-line treatment of Pembrolizumab;

other_outcome.description: Correlation between the results of TMB and inflammatory T cell gene expression profiles in tumor tissues of baseline patients and the efficacy and prognosis.

clinical_study.condition: Head and Neck Squamous Cell Carcinoma

intervention.description: Pembrolizumab (formerly lambrolizumab, brand name Keytruda) is a humanized antibody used in cancer immunotherapy. This includes to treat melanoma, lung cancer, head and neck cancer, Hodgkin lymphoma, and stomach cancer.

study_pop.textblock: Patients with recurrent and/or metastatic head and neck squamous cell carcinoma who are about to receive advanced first-line treatment.

overall_official.affiliation: Cancer Institute/Hospital, Chinese Academy of Medical Sciences & Peking Union Medical College

facility.name: Cancer Institute/Hospital, Chinese Academy of Medical Sciences & Peking Union Medical College

responsible_party.investigator_title: Director, Head of Oncology, Chief physician

condition_browse.mesh_term: Squamous Cell Carcinoma of Head and Neck
